org.bremersee.pagebuilder

Class PageControlFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bremersee.pagebuilder.PageControlFactory

  • public abstract class PageControlFactory
extends Object

    Factory to create PageControlDtos.

    A PageControlDto can be used to display a Page on a web site.

    Author:
    Christian Bremer

      • isSelectAllEntriesAvailable

        public boolean isSelectAllEntriesAvailable()
        Returns true if the page size selector has an item to choose all available entries, otherwise false. Default is 'true'.

      • setSelectAllEntriesAvailable

        public PageControlFactory setSelectAllEntriesAvailable(boolean selectAllEntriesAvailable)
        Specifies whether the maximum results per page selector has an item to choose all available entries or not. Default is 'true'.
        Parameters:
        selectAllEntriesAvailable - true or false
        Returns:
        the page control factory

      • getMaxPaginationLinks

        public int getMaxPaginationLinks()
        Returns the maximum numbers of pagination links. Default is '7'.

      • isQuerySupported

        public boolean isQuerySupported()
        Specifies whether a query field should be displayed on the page or not. Default is 'true'.
        Returns:
        true if a query field should be displayed on the page, otherwise false

      • setQuerySupported

        public PageControlFactory setQuerySupported(boolean isQuerySupported)
        Specifies whether a query field should be displayed on the page or not. Default is 'true'.
        Parameters:
        isQuerySupported - true if a query field should be displayed on the page, otherwise false
        Returns:
        the page control factory

      • newPageControl

        public <E,T> PageControlDto newPageControl(Page<E> page,
                                           PageEntryTransformer<T,E> transformer,
                                           String pageUrl,
                                           Locale locale)
        Creates a new PageControlDto from the given page.
        The page URL must be the plain URL (with no page control query parameters), e. g.: http://example.org/myapp/mypage.html
        If the locale is not present, the default locale will be used.
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        transformer - the page entry transformer (may be null)
        pageUrl - the plain page URL
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        the created page control

      • newPageControl

        public abstract <E> PageControlDto newPageControl(Page<E> page,
                                                  String pageUrl,
                                                  Locale locale)
        Creates a new PageControlDto from the given page.
        The page URL must be the plain URL (with no page control query parameters), e. g.: http://example.org/myapp/mypage.html
        If the locale is not present, the default locale will be used.
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        pageUrl - the plain page URL
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        the created page control
